page.title: 20CATS AND DOGS,FENSTANTON
page.content: Down {FENSTANTON ROAD,HILTON,} there are some{KENNELS}and a{CATTERY. If the pets owners go on holiday they put their pets in the{KENNELS}or the{ {CATTERY}.Sylvia and Tony Dighton are the owners.The buildings are quite big and opened 4 years ago in 1981. As well as cats and dogs there are a few horses.You can hire a horse and learn to ride it.The{COMMONEST dog is the{springer spaniel}at the kennels.The{oldest dog}they had was a small black mongrel who was 19 years old. The{cats}have their own IGLOOS to sleep in.On the doors there are labels with the cats or dogs name on. This identifies them so they do not get muddled up with other cats and dogs. They also clip,comb and wash the animal if the owners want them to be.
